<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Spiritual Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=1826) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Divine Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=611) or [Occult Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=612)

</column>

---

Your magical blood is rich with spiritual essence, and this infusion within you allows your spells to be fully effective against incorporeal creatures, spirits, and creatures on the Ethereal Plane. Your spells have the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune. They can target or affect a creature projecting its consciousness (such as via [_project image_](/Spells.aspx?ID=237)) or possessing another creature, even if its body is elsewhere, though you must know about the possession or projection and choose to do so. Your spells can affect creatures on the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9), though this doesn't grant you any particular ability to locate them.
name: Greater Spiritual Evolution
